title: Literacy rate impact on innovations and environmental pollution in China - Frontiers
summary: The article examines the impact of literacy rate and innovation on environmental pollution in China between 1990 and 2021, emphasizing the importance of education in enhancing innovation for sustainable economic growth while addressing environmental challenges.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 611710 - Educational Support Services, 541715 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 562213 - Solid Waste Combustors and Incinerators, 562112 - Hazardous Waste Collection
